name: The Creator's Soulbook
headline: Write the Book Your Soul Came Here to Write
subheadline: A complete life operating system with 7 pillars, 3 life book frameworks, and AI-powered coaching prompts. Free Obsidian vault included.
promise: Design, track, and transform every dimension of your life with a framework built for creators, artists, and visionaries.
summary: Your personal collection of Life Books offering different lenses for transformation. Includes complete Obsidian vault, AI prompt library, and reflection templates.
transformation: Map all 7 life pillars (Energy, Mind, Soul, Craft, Capital, Circle, Legacy) with structured reflection exercises
Choose your transformation lens: Life Symphony (for artists), Golden Path (for seekers), or 7 Pillars (for builders)
Access 25+ AI coaching prompts designed for deep self-reflection and life architecture
Download ready-to-use Obsidian vault with templates, dashboards, and pre-configured themes

guarantee.label: Open Source Forever
guarantee.description: The Creator's Soulbook is and will always be free. Open source on GitHub for the creator community.

modules.title: The 7 Pillars Framework
modules.description: Energy, Mind, Soul, Craft, Capital, Circle, and Legacy - the complete architecture for an extraordinary life.

modules.title: Three Life Book Perspectives
modules.description: Life Symphony (for artists), Golden Path (for seekers), and The 7 Pillars (for builders) - same wisdom, different metaphors.

modules.title: AI Coaching Prompt Library
modules.description: 25+ Claude-powered prompts for deep reflection, goal-setting, and transformation tracking.

modules.title: Obsidian Vault Templates
modules.description: Ready-to-use daily reflection templates, weekly reviews, and progress dashboards with Dataview integration.

faq.question: Do I need Obsidian to use the Soulbook?
faq.answer: The vault works best with Obsidian (free app), but the frameworks and prompts work in any note-taking system or even pen and paper.

faq.question: Which Life Book should I start with?
faq.answer: If you're a musician or artist, start with Life Symphony. If you're a seeker or visionary, try Golden Path. If you prefer structured systems, The 7 Pillars is for you.

faq.question: Is there a premium version?
faq.answer: The complete framework is free forever. Premium options include guided programs, community support, and 1:1 coaching - coming soon.

files.name: Soulbook Complete Guide
files.description: The complete Creator's Soulbook framework with all 7 pillars

files.description: Ready-to-use Obsidian vault with templates and dashboards

promise: Go from AI overwhelm to a trusted daily ritual. One week to measurable creative velocity.
summary: Structured prompts, workflow templates, and daily rituals that turn AI into your creative co-pilot, not a distraction.
transformation: Deploy 100+ validated prompts across storytelling, marketing, content, and operations within 48 hours
Cut content creation time by 40-50% while maintaining creative voice and quality
Run 12 plug-and-play automations (email, social, drafting) that handle the mechanical stuff
Build a repeatable daily ritual that ships consistently without burnout

guarantee.description: 30-day complete satisfaction guarantee. If your workflow isn't transformed, we refund every penny.

faq.question: What makes the FrankX.ai system different?
faq.answer: Every asset is validated across six specialized agents, ensuring strategic, creative, and technical excellence rather than single-expert bias.

faq.question: Who is the toolkit for?
faq.answer: Creators, consultants, and teams who want a governed, repeatable AI workflow that scales from solo practice to enterprise delivery.

faq.question: How fast will I see results?
faq.answer: Most members report tangible improvements within one week using the quick-start rituals and daily momentum prompts.

name: Vibe OS: Creative State Management
headline: Manage Your Creative Energy and Focus Like a Pro
subheadline: Track your creative states, optimize your energy cycles, and build sustainable workflows. A practical system for creators who ship consistently.
promise: Stop fighting your energy. Start working with your natural creative rhythms.
summary: A builder-focused state management system with mood tracking, energy optimization, and workflow templates for consistent creative output.
transformation: Identify your peak creative hours and schedule deep work during your natural energy peaks
Track creative state patterns to understand what conditions produce your best work
Build sustainable workflows that match your energy cycles instead of fighting them
Reduce burnout and increase output with data-driven creative state management

guarantee.label: Open Source & Free Forever
guarantee.description: Vibe OS is free to use with no strings attached. Track your creative states and optimize your workflow without paying a penny.

modules.title: Energy State Tracker
modules.description: Log your creative energy levels throughout the day to identify patterns and optimize your schedule.

modules.title: Focus Mode Templates
modules.description: Pre-built workflows for deep work, brainstorming, editing, and admin tasks matched to different energy states.

modules.title: Creative Cycle Dashboard
modules.description: Visualize your productivity patterns, peak hours, and energy cycles to make data-driven workflow decisions.

modules.title: State Management Playbooks
modules.description: Practical guides for transitioning between creative states, managing context switching, and maintaining flow.

bonuses.title: Weekly Review Templates
bonuses.description: Structured reflection prompts to analyze your creative patterns and optimize future weeks.

bonuses.title: Energy Optimization Guide
bonuses.description: Science-backed strategies for managing energy, focus, and creative momentum.

bonuses.title: Notion Dashboard Template
bonuses.description: Ready-to-use Notion workspace for tracking states, projects, and productivity metrics.

faq.question: Is Vibe OS really free?
faq.answer: Yes. Vibe OS is completely free with no hidden costs, trials, or premium tiers. It's built for creators who want practical tools without the paywall.

faq.question: How is this different from other productivity tools?
faq.answer: Vibe OS focuses specifically on creative work patterns and energy management. It's designed for creators, not corporate knowledge workers.

faq.question: Do I need technical skills to use it?
faq.answer: No. Vibe OS is built for creators, not engineers. If you can use Notion or a spreadsheet, you can use Vibe OS.

faq.question: Will there be a paid version?
faq.answer: Maybe someday, but the core Vibe OS will always be free. Any future premium features would be add-ons, not requirements.

name: Creation Chronicles
headline: Build Authority Through Consistent, Compelling Stories
subheadline: From fragmented content to a unified narrative system that grows your audience 3x and converts readers into paying customers every month.
promise: A storytelling operating system that turns your voice into a revenue engine. Clear strategy. Repeatable production. Measurable growth.
summary: Strategic frameworks, AI-assisted workflows, and distribution rituals that ship stories consistently and build real authority.
transformation: Replace scattered messaging with a core narrative arc that runs through every piece you ship (essays, videos, social)
Publish 2-3x more content with the same effort using templated AI workflows (writers report 40-60% time savings)
Grow engaged community with distribution playbooks that send your best work to the right people every week
Track revenue impact: each piece connected to pipeline milestones so you see what storytelling actually returns

guarantee.label: Narrative Impact Guarantee
guarantee.description: Implement the core storytelling sprints for 45 days. If you don't see clearer messaging and measurable engagement lifts, we refund you in full.

modules.title: Strategic Story Architecture
modules.description: Define your brand story spine, message hierarchy, and emotional hooks across audiences.

modules.title: Content Creation Systems
modules.description: Editorial calendars, AI prompt packs, and multi-format adaptation workflows for consistent publishing.

modules.title: Audience Development Engine
modules.description: Persona maps, community rituals, and feedback loops to nurture devoted readers and buyers.

modules.title: Omnichannel Distribution
modules.description: SEO, social amplification, and partnership templates to scale reach without burnout.

bonuses.title: Launch Narrative Templates
bonuses.description: Swipe files for product launches, founder letters, and transformation case studies.

bonuses.title: Editorial Operations Hub
bonuses.description: Notion + Airtable base that tracks ideas, drafts, approvals, and analytics.

bonuses.title: Story Circle Live Lab
bonuses.description: Monthly critique sessions with the FrankX storytelling collective.

pricingTiers.name: Creator Package
pricingTiers.description: Solo creators and early-stage brands establishing their foundational story.

pricingTiers.name: Business Package
pricingTiers.description: Growing teams ready to scale narrative-led marketing with AI-assisted workflows.

pricingTiers.name: Enterprise Package
pricingTiers.description: Established organizations seeking custom storytelling operations and enablement.

faq.question: Will this work if we already have a content team?
faq.answer: Yes. Creation Chronicles slots into existing teams with playbooks for producers, editors, and leadership so everyone operates from the same narrative source code.

faq.question: Do we need AI tools in place to benefit?
faq.answer: We show you how to layer AI responsibly. Every workflow includes both manual and AI-assisted versions so you can adopt at your own pace.

faq.question: How much time should we expect to invest?
faq.answer: Plan for a 90-day rollout with weekly story sprints. Teams typically spend 4–6 hours per week implementing and reviewing.

name: Creator Studio OS
headline: Multiply Your Output. Protect Your Voice. Keep Creative Control.
subheadline: Custom-built multi-modal studio that automates versioning, distribution, and QA while you stay in the director's chair. 2-week sprint to full deployment.
promise: Go from 1-2 pieces per month to 3-4 per week. All channels. Same voice. Your standards.
summary: Hands-on buildout that creates a governed AI studio pipeline for video, audio, writing, and visuals calibrated to your brand.
transformation: Map your complete creative pipeline and identify exactly where AI accelerates (without replacing craft)
Build templated workflows so every idea automatically versions for YouTube, TikTok, podcast, email (1 creation = 6 pieces)
Ship with QA rituals and brand guidelines baked in so AI stays on-brand and collaborative
Track output velocity, audience signals, and revenue per piece on a live dashboard that shows what's actually working

guarantee.label: Creative Integrity Promise
guarantee.description: We co-design workflow changes with you. If the system does not boost output within 45 days, we iterate at no cost.

offer.note: Diagnostics map your current process, gaps, and the automation plan before any build begins.

modules.title: Creative Pipeline Blueprint
modules.description: Map every step from ideation to publish, highlighting where AI accelerates and where human craft stays in control.

modules.title: Automation & Templates
modules.description: Build prompt stacks, editing templates, caption writers, and distribution macros tailored to your channels.

modules.title: Brand Intelligence Kit
modules.description: Train models on your voice, visuals, and guidelines with safety checks baked in.

modules.title: Performance Dashboard
modules.description: Run a Notion/Supabase dashboard that tracks output velocity, audience signals, and monetisation.

pricingTiers.name: Starter Studio
pricingTiers.description: Two-week sprint to audit your creative stack and ship a pilot workflow.

pricingTiers.name: Creator Collective
pricingTiers.description: Six-week engagement to roll out multi-channel automations and training.

pricingTiers.name: Residency
pricingTiers.description: Ongoing co-building with the FrankX agent collective for launches, tours, or season arcs.

faq.question: Is this just for big teams?
faq.answer: No. We design for solo creators up to small crews. The system scales, but it starts creator-first.

faq.question: How fast will we see impact?
faq.answer: Most sprints unlock a new publishing rhythm within 30 days. We track output velocity and sentiment so you can see progress.

faq.question: Do you train us on the tools?
faq.answer: Yes. Every build includes recorded walkthroughs, prompt decks, and live handoffs so you stay in control.

name: Creator Lab OS
headline: 30-Day Lab to Ship Your Repeatable Launch Machine
subheadline: Co-designed coaching + build sessions that architect your complete creator operating system. Idea to monetized release every single week, guaranteed.
promise: Build the system that turns creative chaos into predictable weekly shipping. Momentum, clarity, revenue—measured from day 1.
summary: Live cohort lab where you co-architect rituals, automations, and accountability that keep your practice consistently shipping.
transformation: Clarify exactly who you're creating for and what offer maps to your unique strengths (1-week sprint)
Design your complete idea-to-monetized-release pipeline with automations that handle the boring stuff
Establish weekly rituals and dashboard checkpoints so you know momentum is compounding (not just hoping)
Ship one live release during the cohort with peer feedback, analytics, and your first real revenue signal

guarantee.label: Momentum Promise
guarantee.description: If you do the work and the system does not increase your publishing cadence within 30 days of graduation, we coach you until it does.

offer.note: Applications reviewed weekly. Cohorts are capped to keep the studio intimate.

modules.title: Creative Compass
modules.description: Codify your story, audience promise, and revenue focus so every ritual points to the same horizon.

modules.title: Launch Lab
modules.description: Design the idea-to-publish pipeline with automations, templates, and handoff notes.

modules.title: Systems Studio
modules.description: Wire dashboards, automation routers, and prompt libraries that keep the lab running.

modules.title: Field Tests
modules.description: Ship a live release with accountability, analytics, and peer feedback.

pricingTiers.name: Self-Paced Starter
pricingTiers.description: Toolkit + recorded labs for creators who prefer to implement solo.

pricingTiers.name: Guided Cohort
pricingTiers.description: Four-week live lab with Frank + agents to build your system together.

pricingTiers.name: Creator Residency
pricingTiers.description: Ongoing partnership for creators scaling products, shows, or studios.

faq.question: Who is the Creator Lab for?
faq.answer: Creators with a body of work (songs, videos, essays, products) who want a reliable system to ship and monetise consistently.

faq.question: How much time should I budget?
faq.answer: Plan on 4-6 focused hours per week during the cohort. The self-paced track can flex, but momentum matters.

faq.question: Do I need a team?
faq.answer: No. We design the system for solo creators first. If you have collaborators, we fold them into the rituals.

name: Suno Prompt Library Pack
headline: 100+ Battle-Tested Suno Prompts for Every Genre
subheadline: Skip the prompt guessing game. Get the exact prompts that powered 500+ tracks across electronic, hip-hop, cinematic, ambient, and world music.
promise: Stop wasting generations on prompts that don't work. Get proven prompts organized by genre, mood, and energy level.
summary: A comprehensive prompt library extracted from 500+ Suno sessions, organized for instant use in any creative project.
transformation: Access 100+ prompts that actually work—tested across 500+ generations with detailed success notes
Find the perfect prompt in seconds with genre, mood, and energy filters (no more scrolling through chaos)
Learn prompt patterns that unlock specific sounds (the 'why' behind each prompt so you can create your own)
Get bonus prompt modifiers for tempo, instrumentation, and vocal styles that stack with any base prompt

guarantee.label: Prompt Success Guarantee
guarantee.description: If these prompts don't improve your Suno output within 7 days, get a full refund. No questions asked.

modules.title: Electronic & EDM Pack
modules.description: 25 prompts for house, techno, trance, dubstep, and synthwave with BPM and energy modifiers.

modules.title: Hip-Hop & R&B Pack
modules.description: 20 prompts spanning boom bap, trap, lo-fi, and modern R&B with flow and vibe variations.

modules.title: Cinematic & Ambient Pack
modules.description: 25 prompts for film scores, meditation, focus music, and atmospheric soundscapes.

modules.title: World & Fusion Pack
modules.description: 15 prompts for afrobeats, Latin, reggae, and cross-cultural fusion experiments.

modules.title: Modifier Library
modules.description: 50+ stackable modifiers for tempo, instrumentation, vocals, and production style.

bonuses.title: Prompt Formula Cheatsheet
bonuses.description: One-page reference showing the anatomy of a perfect Suno prompt with fill-in templates.

bonuses.title: Genre Quick-Start Cards
bonuses.description: Printable cards for the top 5 prompts in each genre—perfect for studio sessions.

bonuses.title: Monthly Prompt Updates
bonuses.description: New prompts added monthly as Suno evolves and new techniques emerge.

faq.question: Are these prompts compatible with Suno v4/v4.5?
faq.answer: Yes. All prompts are tested on the latest Suno versions and updated when new features launch.

faq.question: Can I modify and customize these prompts?
faq.answer: Absolutely. Each prompt includes notes on what to change and how the modifiers work together.

faq.question: What format are the prompts delivered in?
faq.answer: PDF guide with searchable text + Notion database for easy filtering and organization.

faq.question: How is this different from Vibe OS?
faq.answer: The Prompt Library is just the prompts. Vibe OS includes the full production system—workflows, emotion mapping, and release playbooks. This is the quick-start option.
